sw-settings-license-check.description: The versatile hero slider: bold visuals, clear messaging, smart CTAs. Built for brand stories and campaigns.

features.heroSlider: Hero Slider - Multi-slide hero blocks with headlines, text, buttons, and images
features.heroTwoColumns: Hero Two Columns Image & Text - Two-column layout with flexible background options (Parallax scroll: coming soon)
features.heroVideoExtended: Hero Video Extended - Video hero blocks with headlines, text, and buttons (Coming soon)
features.heroInstagramFeed: Hero Instagram Feed Widget - Instagram feed integration for mega menu and custom blocks (Coming soon)
features.megaMenu: Mega Menu Block - Advanced navigation block with products, widgets, and Instagram feed support (Coming soon)
features.shoppingExperience: Shopping Experience Blocks - Additional custom blocks for enhanced shopping experiences (In development)

update.noUpdateAvailableMessage: You are already using the latest version ({currentVersion})
update.licenseExpiredMessage: ⚠️ Your license has expired. Updates can no longer be loaded. Please renew your license.
update.downloadSuccessMessage: The plugin update has been downloaded and installed successfully. Please refresh the page to see the changes.

instagram.licenseExpiredMessage: ⚠️ Your license has expired. Instagram Feed API requests are no longer possible. Please renew your license.
instagram.validationSuccessMessage: Your Instagram API credentials are valid and working correctly.
instagram.validationFailedMessage: The Instagram token validation could not be performed. Please check your API credentials.

setupGuide.title: Instagram Basic Display API - Setup Guide
setupGuide.description: Follow these steps to set up your Instagram app and obtain the required API credentials:

step1.title: Step 1: Create Instagram App
step1.description: Create a new app in the Facebook Developer Console. Select 'Instagram Basic Display' as the product type.

step2.title: Step 2: Configure App
step2.description: Configure your app: Add the Redirect URI, enable Instagram Basic Display API, and create test users (for development).

step3.title: Step 3: Generate Access Token
step3.description: Generate a Long-Lived Access Token via the Instagram Basic Display API. This token is valid for 60 days and can be automatically renewed with a Refresh Token.

instagramFeed.licenseExpiredMessage: ⚠️ Your license has expired. Instagram Feed API requests are no longer possible. Please renew your license.

bestPractices.title: Instagram Basic Display API - Best Practices
bestPractices.appId: Create an Instagram App in Facebook Developer Console (developers.facebook.com)
bestPractices.appSecret: Store App ID and App Secret securely (do not commit to Git)
bestPractices.redirectUri: Register the Redirect URI in Facebook Developer Console (must match exactly)
bestPractices.accessToken: Use Long-Lived Access Tokens (valid for 60 days) with automatic renewal via Refresh Token

languageSwitcher.hint: These languages will be displayed in the Language Switcher in the header (desktop).
languageSwitcher.noLanguages: No languages found. Please check your language configuration.
